Title: Relates to banning the use of facial recognition technology in the tracking of the coronavirus (COVID-19)
Summary: Bans the use of facial recognition technology in the tracking of the coronavirus (COVID-19).
LawCode: Add ยง52-c, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to banning the use of facial recognition technology in the tracking of the coronavirus (COVID-19)
